channel.title: The npc's have low health
channel.description: when i play morpascape i get very lonly and i get bored so i poof up amonster to fight but the problem is the npc has no health its health (if its man or black dragon) is 0/0 so it dies soon as i attack it can you help me out here

item.title: The npc's have low health
item.dc:creator: @lordslayer565 lordslayer565
item.description:
@lordslayer565 wrote:

U have to change the npc data in the file.

Go to the file path:

C:\Program Files\MoparScape\HybridScape

There should be a file called npc.cfg open that.
in there it should look like this:

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat--health

Look for the npc id you wanna change.Once you find it change the 0 in health to what you want the value to be.You can also change the combat to make the npc harder to fight.(the combat level in game wonâ€™t change it will just be harder)
Have fun!

Read full topic
